column4: ok, can I have help with cdrecord on ubuntu-server for the 100th time?
ok I try cdrecord -v -pam dev=ATAPI:0,2,0 ./image.iso and it says wdom can't see the cd and /dev/hda is mounted
well after all your offtopicness no wonder he jumped the gun, calm down
if no one knows the answer to your question no one will answer, try asking again every 10 minutes or so
